statement.title: Problem Description
statement.content:
Friend number are defined recursively as follows.
(1) numbers 1 and 2 are friend number;
(2) if a and b are friend numbers, so is ab+a+b;
(3) only the numbers defined in (1) and (2) are friend number.
Now your task is to judge whether an integer is a friend number.

statement.title: Input
statement.content: There are several lines in input, each line has a nunnegative integer a, 0<=a<=2^30.

statement.title: Output
statement.content: For the number a on each line of the input, if a is a friend number, output “YES!”, otherwise output “NO!”.
